projects.name: Self-Organizing Growth System
projects.summary: A digital growth simulation inspired by Neural Cellular Automata, where forms evolve from a single pixel into complex patterns — including the KBG logo — exploring how simple rules can produce lifelike behavior.

projects.name: OptiHive: A Biomimetic Optimization Toolkit
projects.summary: A Python toolkit inspired by swarm intelligence and natural heuristics, implementing algorithms like particle swarm, ant colony, and firefly optimization for education and research.

projects.name: BioSphere
projects.summary: A hands-on ecological project where students build and maintain terrariums to explore self-sustaining ecosystems, resource cycles, and environmental balance.

projects.name: Hive Simulator
projects.summary: An interactive, grid-based environment for experimenting with swarm dynamics and bio-inspired entity behavior, allowing users to design custom maps and agents.

projects.name: GenomeViz
projects.summary: Interactive visualization for genomic regions and variant mapping, enabling exploration of gene structures and mutations in an intuitive interface.

projects.name: CellClass
projects.summary: A machine learning model that classifies cell types based on gene expression data, helping in understanding cell differentiation and disease states.

projects.name: BioSense
projects.summary: A portable biosensor integrating AI models for non-invasive glucose detection using saliva samples, designed for affordable health monitoring.

projects.name: ProteinPredict
projects.summary: Deep learning model for predicting 3D protein structures from amino acid sequences, inspired by AlphaFold’s architecture and techniques.

projects.name: EcoBot
projects.summary: An autonomous rover for environmental monitoring and bio-sample collection using camera-based navigation and environmental sensors.

projects.name: NeuroLens
projects.summary: An EEG-based headset that measures attention levels and visualizes brain activity in real-time through Bluetooth-connected software.

projects.name: PathoAI
projects.summary: An AI system that identifies pathogens in microscopy images using convolutional neural networks, aiding rapid diagnosis and microbiology research.

projects.name: MedChat
projects.summary: Conversational assistant trained on biomedical datasets, capable of answering complex medical and research-related queries using large language models.

projects.name: BioLogger
projects.summary: An IoT-based system that collects and visualizes physiological signals in real-time, bridging hardware sensing and data analytics.
